name: Steven Seagull: Owl By Herself
description:
Officer Steven Seagull is one hardened fowl who has seen some shit...mostly bird shit. Join him on one of his most egg curding cases ever as he tries to make sure the right birdie goes to jail. Will you be able to help guide Officer Seagull through this tale of woe or will you be left just holding the tail feathers?

Created for the 'Anything But Humans Jam', the subject of the game was picked by rolling a d20 on multiple lists (bird, mystery, buddy cop). It is currently still in development. You'll see through out notes on additions and subtractions to stats. Those and the effects they have on the game will be added once the full story line skeleton has been created.

Know problems: Spelling and grammar mistakes; Music doesn't work
